mapper.select: SELECT A.plan_no, A.ecltnm, Left(A.indate,4) + '-' + substring(A.indate, 5,2)+ '-' + substring(A.indate, 7,2) as indate, Left(A.prod_sdate,4) + '-' + substring(A.prod_sdate, 5,2)+ '-' + substring(A.prod_sdate, 7,2) as prod_sdate, Left(A.prod_edate,4) + '-' + substring(A.prod_edate, 5,2)+ '-' + substring(A.prod_edate, 7,2) as prod_edate, ISNULL(DBO.DF_NM_RTN('TB_WFLAG', A.custcd, A.wflag, '', ''),'') as wflagnm, (CASE WHEN A.wflag = '00010' THEN A.decision1 WHEN A.wflag = '00020' THEN A.decision2 WHEN A.wflag = '00030' THEN A.decision3 WHEN A.wflag = '00040' THEN A.decision4 ELSE A.decision END ) AS STATUSCD, isnull((select wrmcnm from TB_FPLAN_WRMC where wflag = E.wflag and wrmc = E.wrmc),'') as wrmcnm , (CASE WHEN E.winps > 1 THEN DBO.DF_NM_RTN('TB_JA001', E.custcd, E.wrps, '', '') + '외 ' + CAST(E.winps - 1 AS VARCHAR(2)) + '명' ELSE DBO.DF_NM_RTN('TB_JA001', E.custcd, E.wrps, '', '') END ) as wrpsnm, DBO.DF_NM_RTN('TB_JA001', E.custcd, (SELECT TOP 1 wrps FROM TB_FPLAN_W020 WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE lotno =E.glotnono) , '', '') as gumwrpsnm, (case when A.rwflag = 'D' THEN '주간' WHEN A.rwflag = 'N' THEN '야간' ELSE '' END) AS rwflagnm, A.lotno , isnull(E.glotnono, '') as qlotno, isnull(E.glotnono, '') as glotnono, (SELECT TOP 1 indate FROM TB_FPLAN_W020 WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE lotno =E.glotnono) AS ginputdate, D.jpum, D.jgugek , D.jchajong, isnull(A.prod_qty, 0) as prod_qty , isnull(E.winqt, 0) as winqt, isnull(E.wbdqt, 0) as wbdqt, isnull(E.wotqt, 0) as wotqt, isnull(E.wotqt, 0) - isnull(E.wbdqt, 0) as wjqty, isnull(E.gqty01, 0) AS gumqty, E.wfrdt, E.wtrdt, A.inmonth, A.inweeks FROM TB_FPLAN A WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_FPLAN_work C ON A.plan_no = c.plan_no AND A.wflag = c.wflag LEFT OUTER JOIN JCODE D ON A.pcode = D.jkey LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_FPLAN_W010 E ON E.plan_no = A.plan_no and E.wrps Like concat('%',#{wrps},'%') WHERE A.indate between #{frdate} and #{todate} and isnull(A.cltcd,'') Like concat('%',#{cltcd},'%') and isnull(A.pcode,'') Like concat('%',#{pcode},'%')

SELECT A.plan_no, A.ecltnm, Left(A.indate,4) + '-' + substring(A.indate, 5,2)+ '-' + substring(A.indate, 7,2) as indate, Left(A.prod_sdate,4) + '-' + substring(A.prod_sdate, 5,2)+ '-' + substring(A.prod_sdate, 7,2) as prod_sdate, Left(A.prod_edate,4) + '-' + substring(A.prod_edate, 5,2)+ '-' + substring(A.prod_edate, 7,2) as prod_edate, ISNULL(DBO.DF_NM_RTN('TB_WFLAG', A.custcd, A.wflag, '', ''),'') as wflagnm, (CASE WHEN A.wflag = '00010' THEN A.decision1 WHEN A.wflag = '00020' THEN A.decision2 WHEN A.wflag = '00030' THEN A.decision3 WHEN A.wflag = '00040' THEN A.decision4 ELSE A.decision END ) AS STATUSCD, isnull((select wrmcnm from TB_FPLAN_WRMC where wflag = E.wflag and wrmc = E.wrmc),'') as wrmcnm , (CASE WHEN E.winps > 1 THEN DBO.DF_NM_RTN('TB_JA001', E.custcd, E.wrps, '', '') + '외 ' + CAST(E.winps - 1 AS VARCHAR(2)) + '명' ELSE DBO.DF_NM_RTN('TB_JA001', E.custcd, E.wrps, '', '') END ) as wrpsnm, (case when A.rwflag = 'D' THEN '주간' WHEN A.rwflag = 'N' THEN '야간' ELSE '' END) AS rwflagnm, A.lotno , isnull(E.glotnono, '') as glotnono, D.jpum, D.jgugek , D.jchajong, isnull(A.prod_qty, 0) as prod_qty , isnull(E.winqt, 0) as winqt, isnull(E.wbdqt, 0) as wbdqt, isnull(E.wotqt, 0) as wotqt, isnull(E.winqt, 0) - isnull(E.wbdqt, 0) as wjqty, isnull(E.gqty01, 0) AS gumqty, E.wfrdt, E.wtrdt, E.partcode FROM TB_FPLAN A WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_FPLAN_work C ON A.plan_no = c.plan_no AND A.wflag = c.wflag LEFT OUTER JOIN JCODE D ON A.pcode = D.jkey, TB_FPLAN_W010 E WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE A.plan_no = E.plan_no and E.indate between #{frdate} and #{todate} and isnull(A.lotno,'') Like concat('%',#{lotno},'%')

SELECT A.custcd, A.spjangcd, (A.plan_no) AS plan_no, A.cltcd, B.acorp as cltnm, A.pcode, C.jpum AS pname, C.jgugek AS psize, C.jdanwy AS punit, A.lotno as lotno, (A.prod_sdate) as prod_sdate, (A.prod_edate) AS prod_edate, E.wfrdt as wfrdt, E.wtrdt as wtrdt, E.wotqt - E.wbdqt as prod_qty, E.gqty01 as end_qty, D.lotno AS glotnono, D.indate as qcdate, isnull(D.wotqt,0) as owqty, isnull(D.wotqt,0) - isnull(D.wbdqt,0) as otqty, D.winps as winps, D.wrps as wrps, D.wremark as wremark, (CASE WHEN E.winps > 1 THEN DBO.DF_NM_RTN('TB_JA001', A.custcd, E.wrps, '', '') + '외 ' + CAST(D.winps - 1 AS VARCHAR(2)) + '명' ELSE DBO.DF_NM_RTN('TB_JA001', A.custcd, E.wrps, '', '') END ) wrpsnm01, (CASE WHEN D.winps > 1 THEN DBO.DF_NM_RTN('TB_JA001', A.custcd, D.wrps, '', '') + '외 ' + CAST(D.winps - 1 AS VARCHAR(2)) + '명' ELSE DBO.DF_NM_RTN('TB_JA001', A.custcd, D.wrps, '', '') END ) wrpsnm02 FROM TB_FPLAN_W020 D WITH(NOLOCK) LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_FPLAN_IWORK F ON D.lotno = F.glotno LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_FPLAN A ON A.plan_no = F.plan_no AND Len( ISNULL(A.wflag,'') ) > 0 LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_FPLAN_W010 E ON A.plan_no = E.plan_no AND Len( ISNULL(A.wflag,'') ) > 0 , JCODE C WITH(NOLOCK), CIF B WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE (A.pcode = C.JKEY) AND (A.cltcd = B.acorp1 + CAST(B.acorp2 as varchar) ) and D.indate between #{frdate} and #{todate} AND ( ISNULL(D.lotno,'') lIKE concat('%',#{lotno},'%') ) ORDER BY D.lotno, A.LOTNO

SELECT A.plan_no, A.ecltnm, Left(A.indate,4) + '-' + substring(A.indate, 5,2)+ '-' + substring(A.indate, 7,2) as indate, Left(A.prod_sdate,4) + '-' + substring(A.prod_sdate, 5,2)+ '-' + substring(A.prod_sdate, 7,2) as prod_sdate, Left(A.prod_edate,4) + '-' + substring(A.prod_edate, 5,2)+ '-' + substring(A.prod_edate, 7,2) as prod_edate, ISNULL(DBO.DF_NM_RTN('TB_WFLAG', A.custcd, A.wflag, '', ''),'') as wflagnm, (CASE WHEN A.wflag = '00010' THEN A.decision1 WHEN A.wflag = '00020' THEN A.decision2 WHEN A.wflag = '00030' THEN A.decision3 WHEN A.wflag = '00040' THEN A.decision4 ELSE A.decision END ) AS STATUSCD, isnull((select wrmcnm from TB_FPLAN_WRMC where wflag = E.wflag and wrmc = E.wrmc),'') as wrmcnm , (CASE WHEN E.winps > 1 THEN DBO.DF_NM_RTN('TB_JA001', E.custcd, E.wrps, '', '') + '외 ' + CAST(E.winps - 1 AS VARCHAR(2)) + '명' ELSE DBO.DF_NM_RTN('TB_JA001', E.custcd, E.wrps, '', '') END ) as wrpsnm, (case when A.rwflag = 'D' THEN '주간' WHEN A.rwflag = 'N' THEN '야간' ELSE '' END) AS rwflagnm, A.lotno , isnull(E.glotnono, '') as glotnono, D.jpum, D.jgugek , D.jchajong, isnull(A.prod_qty, 0) as prod_qty , isnull(E.winqt, 0) as winqt, isnull(E.wbdqt, 0) as wbdqt, isnull(E.wotqt, 0) as wotqt, isnull(E.wotqt, 0) - isnull(E.wbdqt, 0) as wjqty, isnull(E.gqty01, 0) AS gumqty, E.wfrdt, E.wtrdt, A.inmonth, A.inweeks, CAST(DATEDIFF(MINUTE, E.wfrdt, E.wtrdt) / 60.0 AS decimal(10,1) ) AS workhr, DATEDIFF(MINUTE, E.wfrdt, E.wtrdt) AS workmin, CASE WHEN isnull(E.wbdqt, 0) > 0 AND isnull(E.wotqt, 0) > 0 THEN Round( (isnull(E.wbdqt, 0) / isnull(E.wotqt, 0)) * 100 , 2) ELSE 0 END AS wbdyul FROM TB_FPLAN A WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_FPLAN_work C ON A.plan_no = c.plan_no AND A.wflag = c.wflag LEFT OUTER JOIN JCODE D ON A.pcode = D.jkey, TB_FPLAN_W010 E WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE A.plan_no = E.plan_no and E.indate between #{frdate} and #{todate} and isnull(E.wrps,'') Like concat('%',#{wrps},'%') and isnull(A.lotno,'') Like concat('%',#{lotno},'%') and isnull(E.wrmc,'') Like concat('%',#{wrmcnm},'%') order by A.plan_no

SELECT A.plan_no, A.ecltnm, Left(A.indate,4) + '-' + substring(A.indate, 5,2)+ '-' + substring(A.indate, 7,2) as indate, Left(A.prod_sdate,4) + '-' + substring(A.prod_sdate, 5,2)+ '-' + substring(A.prod_sdate, 7,2) as prod_sdate, Left(A.prod_edate,4) + '-' + substring(A.prod_edate, 5,2)+ '-' + substring(A.prod_edate, 7,2) as prod_edate, ISNULL(DBO.DF_NM_RTN('TB_WFLAG', A.custcd, A.wflag, '', ''),'') as wflagnm, isnull((select wrmcnm from TB_FPLAN_WRMC where wflag = E.wflag and wrmc = E.wrmc),'') as wrmcnm , (CASE WHEN E.winps > 1 THEN DBO.DF_NM_RTN('TB_JA001', E.custcd, E.wrps, '', '') + '외 ' + CAST(E.winps - 1 AS VARCHAR(2)) + '명' ELSE DBO.DF_NM_RTN('TB_JA001', E.custcd, E.wrps, '', '') END ) as wrpsnm, (case when A.rwflag = 'D' THEN '주간' WHEN A.rwflag = 'N' THEN '야간' ELSE '' END) AS rwflagnm, A.lotno , D.jpum, D.jgugek , D.jchajong, isnull(A.prod_qty, 0) as prod_qty , C.wfrdt, C.wtrdt, C.wrerm, A.inmonth, A.inweeks, CAST(DATEDIFF(MINUTE, C.wfrdt, C.wtrdt) / 60.0 AS decimal(10,1) ) AS workhr, DATEDIFF(MINUTE, C.wfrdt, C.wtrdt) AS workmin FROM TB_FPLAN A WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT OUTER JOIN JCODE D ON A.pcode = D.jkey, TB_FPLAN_W010 E WITH (NOLOCK), TB_FPLAN_WTIME C WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE A.plan_no = E.plan_no and A.plan_no = c.plan_no and c.wflag = '00010' and A.indate between #{frdate} and #{todate} and isnull(A.lotno,'') Like concat('%',#{lotno},'%') order by A.plan_no, C.wfrdt, C.wseq, C.seq

SELECT A.custcd, A.spjangcd, (A.plan_no) AS plan_no, A.cltcd, B.acorp as cltnm, A.pcode, C.jpum AS pname, C.jgugek AS psize, C.jdanwy AS punit, A.lotno as lotno, (A.prod_sdate) as prod_sdate, (A.prod_edate) AS prod_edate, E.wfrdt as wfrdt, E.wtrdt as wtrdt, E.wotqt - E.wbdqt as prod_qty, E.gqty01 as end_qty, D.lotno AS glotnono, D.indate as qcdate, isnull(D.wotqt,0) as owqty, isnull(D.wotqt,0) - isnull(D.wbdqt,0) as otqty, D.winps as winps, D.wrps as wrps, D.wremark as wremark, (CASE WHEN E.winps > 1 THEN DBO.DF_NM_RTN('TB_JA001', A.custcd, E.wrps, '', '') + '외 ' + CAST(D.winps - 1 AS VARCHAR(2)) + '명' ELSE DBO.DF_NM_RTN('TB_JA001', A.custcd, E.wrps, '', '') END ) wrpsnm01, (CASE WHEN D.winps > 1 THEN DBO.DF_NM_RTN('TB_JA001', A.custcd, D.wrps, '', '') + '외 ' + CAST(D.winps - 1 AS VARCHAR(2)) + '명' ELSE DBO.DF_NM_RTN('TB_JA001', A.custcd, D.wrps, '', '') END ) wrpsnm02 FROM TB_FPLAN_W020 D WITH(NOLOCK) LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_FPLAN_W010 E ON D.lotno = E.glotnono LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_FPLAN A ON A.plan_no = E.plan_no AND Len( ISNULL(A.wflag,'') ) > 0 , JCODE C WITH(NOLOCK), CIF B WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE (A.pcode = C.JKEY) AND (A.cltcd = B.acorp1 + CAST(B.acorp2 as varchar) ) and D.indate between #{frdate} and #{todate} and isnull(D.wrps,'') Like concat('%',#{wrps},'%') ORDER BY D.lotno, A.LOTNO

SELECT A.plan_no, A.ecltnm, Left(A.indate,4) + '-' + substring(A.indate, 5,2)+ '-' + substring(A.indate, 7,2) as indate, Left(A.prod_sdate,4) + '-' + substring(A.prod_sdate, 5,2)+ '-' + substring(A.prod_sdate, 7,2) as prod_sdate, Left(A.prod_edate,4) + '-' + substring(A.prod_edate, 5,2)+ '-' + substring(A.prod_edate, 7,2) as prod_edate, ISNULL(DBO.DF_NM_RTN('TB_WFLAG', A.custcd, A.wflag, '', ''),'') as wflagnm, (CASE WHEN A.wflag = '00010' THEN A.decision1 WHEN A.wflag = '00020' THEN A.decision2 WHEN A.wflag = '00030' THEN A.decision3 WHEN A.wflag = '00040' THEN A.decision4 ELSE A.decision END ) AS STATUSCD, isnull((select wrmcnm from TB_FPLAN_WRMC where wflag = E.wflag and wrmc = E.wrmc),'') as wrmcnm , (CASE WHEN E.winps > 1 THEN DBO.DF_NM_RTN('TB_JA001', E.custcd, E.wrps, '', '') + '외 ' + CAST(E.winps - 1 AS VARCHAR(2)) + '명' ELSE DBO.DF_NM_RTN('TB_JA001', E.custcd, E.wrps, '', '') END ) as wrpsnm, (case when A.rwflag = 'D' THEN '주간' WHEN A.rwflag = 'N' THEN '야간' ELSE '' END) AS rwflagnm, A.lotno , isnull(E.glotnono, '') as glotnono, D.jpum, D.jgugek , D.jchajong, isnull(A.prod_qty, 0) as prod_qty , isnull(E.winqt, 0) as winqt, isnull(E.wbdqt, 0) as wbdqt, isnull(E.wotqt, 0) as wotqt, isnull(E.winqt, 0) - isnull(E.wbdqt, 0) as wjqty, isnull(E.gqty01, 0) AS gumqty, CASE WHEN isnull(E.wbdqt, 0) > 0 AND isnull(E.gqty01, 0) > 0 THEN Round( (isnull(E.wbdqt, 0) / isnull(E.gqty01, 0)) * 100 , 2) ELSE 0 END AS wbdyul, E.wfrdt, E.wtrdt, (SELECT com_rem1 from TB_CA510 WHERE com_cls = '005' AND com_code != '00' AND com_REM2 = '00010' AND com_code = C.wcode) AS wbdnm, E.wbdqt FROM TB_FPLAN A WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT OUTER JOIN JCODE D ON A.pcode = D.jkey, TB_FPLAN_W010 E WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_FPLAN_WBAD C ON E.plan_no = c.plan_no AND C.wflag = '00010' WHERE A.plan_no = E.plan_no and E.indate between #{frdate} and #{todate} and isnull(C.wcode,'') Like concat('%',#{wcode},'%') and isnull(A.lotno,'') Like concat('%',#{lotno},'%') and len(C.wcode) > 0 order by C.wcode, A.lotno

SELECT YEAR(E.wfrdt) AS yearstr, MONTH(E.wfrdt) AS monthstr, sum(isnull(A.prod_qty, 0)) as prod_qty , sum(isnull(E.winqt, 0)) as winqt, sum(isnull(E.wbdqt, 0)) as wbdqt, sum(isnull(E.wotqt, 0)) as wotqt, sum(isnull(E.winqt, 0)) - sum(isnull(E.wbdqt, 0)) as wjqty, sum(isnull(E.gqty01, 0)) AS gumqty, Round( (sum(isnull(E.wbdqt, 0)) / sum(isnull(E.gqty01, 0))) * 100 , 2) AS wbdyul, (SELECT com_rem1 from TB_CA510 WHERE com_cls = '005' AND com_code != '00' AND com_REM2 = '00010' AND com_code = C.wcode) AS wbdnm FROM TB_FPLAN A WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT OUTER JOIN JCODE D ON A.pcode = D.jkey, TB_FPLAN_W010 E WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_FPLAN_WBAD C ON E.plan_no = c.plan_no AND C.wflag = '00010' WHERE A.plan_no = E.plan_no and E.indate between #{frdate} and #{todate} and isnull(C.wcode,'') Like concat('%',#{wcode},'%') and isnull(A.lotno,'') Like concat('%',#{lotno},'%') and len(C.wcode) > 0 group by C.wcode, YEAR(E.wfrdt), MONTH(E.wfrdt) order by C.wcode

SELECT sum(isnull(A.prod_qty, 0)) as prod_qty , sum(isnull(E.winqt, 0)) as winqt, sum(isnull(E.wbdqt, 0)) as wbdqt, sum(isnull(E.wotqt, 0)) as wotqt, sum(isnull(E.winqt, 0)) - sum(isnull(E.wbdqt, 0)) as wjqty, sum(isnull(E.gqty01, 0)) AS gumqty, Round( (sum(isnull(E.wbdqt, 0)) / sum(isnull(E.gqty01, 0))) * 100 , 2) AS wbdyul, (SELECT com_rem1 from TB_CA510 WHERE com_cls = '005' AND com_code != '00' AND com_REM2 = '00010' AND com_code = C.wcode) AS wbdnm FROM TB_FPLAN A WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT OUTER JOIN JCODE D ON A.pcode = D.jkey, TB_FPLAN_W010 E WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_FPLAN_WBAD C ON E.plan_no = c.plan_no AND C.wflag = '00010' WHERE A.plan_no = E.plan_no and E.indate between #{frdate} and #{todate} and isnull(C.wcode,'') Like concat('%',#{wcode},'%') and isnull(A.lotno,'') Like concat('%',#{lotno},'%') and len(C.wcode) > 0 group by C.wcode order by C.wcode

SELECT A.plan_no, A.ecltnm, Left(A.indate,4) + '-' + substring(A.indate, 5,2)+ '-' + substring(A.indate, 7,2) as indate, Left(A.prod_sdate,4) + '-' + substring(A.prod_sdate, 5,2)+ '-' + substring(A.prod_sdate, 7,2) as prod_sdate, Left(A.prod_edate,4) + '-' + substring(A.prod_edate, 5,2)+ '-' + substring(A.prod_edate, 7,2) as prod_edate, ISNULL(DBO.DF_NM_RTN('TB_WFLAG', A.custcd, A.wflag, '', ''),'') as wflagnm, (CASE WHEN A.wflag = '00010' THEN A.decision1 WHEN A.wflag = '00020' THEN A.decision2 WHEN A.wflag = '00030' THEN A.decision3 WHEN A.wflag = '00040' THEN A.decision4 ELSE A.decision END ) AS STATUSCD, isnull((select wrmcnm from TB_FPLAN_WRMC where wflag = E.wflag and wrmc = E.wrmc),'') as wrmcnm , (CASE WHEN E.winps > 1 THEN DBO.DF_NM_RTN('TB_JA001', E.custcd, E.wrps, '', '') + '외 ' + CAST(E.winps - 1 AS VARCHAR(2)) + '명' ELSE DBO.DF_NM_RTN('TB_JA001', E.custcd, E.wrps, '', '') END ) as wrpsnm, (case when A.rwflag = 'D' THEN '주간' WHEN A.rwflag = 'N' THEN '야간' ELSE '' END) AS rwflagnm, A.lotno , isnull(E.lotno, '') as glotnono, D.jpum, D.jgugek , D.jchajong, isnull(A.prod_qty, 0) as prod_qty , isnull(E.winqt, 0) as winqt, isnull(E.wbdqt, 0) as wbdqt, isnull(E.wotqt, 0) as wotqt, isnull(E.wotqt, 0) - isnull(E.wbdqt, 0) as wjqty, isnull(E.wqcqt, 0) AS gumqty, CASE WHEN isnull(E.wbdqt, 0) > 0 AND isnull(E.wotqt, 0) > 0 THEN Round( (isnull(E.wbdqt, 0) / isnull(E.wotqt, 0)) * 100 , 2) ELSE 0 END AS wbdyul, E.wfrdt, E.wtrdt, (SELECT com_rem1 from TB_CA510 WHERE com_cls = '005' AND com_code != '00' AND com_REM2 = '00020' AND com_code = C.wcode) AS wbdnm, E.wbdqt FROM TB_FPLAN A WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT OUTER JOIN JCODE D ON A.pcode = D.jkey, TB_FPLAN_W020 E WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_FPLAN_WBAD C ON E.lotno = c.plan_no AND C.wflag = '00020' WHERE A.plan_no = E.plan_no and E.indate between #{frdate} and #{todate} and isnull(C.wcode,'') Like concat('%',#{wcode},'%') and isnull(A.lotno,'') Like concat('%',#{lotno},'%') and len(C.wcode) > 0 order by C.wcode, A.lotno

SELECT YEAR(E.wfrdt) AS yearstr, MONTH(E.wfrdt) AS monthstr, sum(isnull(A.prod_qty, 0)) as prod_qty , sum(isnull(E.winqt, 0)) as winqt, sum(isnull(E.wbdqt, 0)) as wbdqt, sum(isnull(E.wotqt, 0)) as wotqt, sum(isnull(E.wotqt, 0)) - sum(isnull(E.wbdqt, 0)) as wjqty, sum(isnull(E.wqcqt, 0)) AS gumqty, Round( (sum(isnull(E.wbdqt, 0)) / sum(isnull(E.wotqt, 0))) * 100 , 2) AS wbdyul, (SELECT com_rem1 from TB_CA510 WHERE com_cls = '005' AND com_code != '00' AND com_REM2 = '00020' AND com_code = C.wcode) AS wbdnm FROM TB_FPLAN A WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT OUTER JOIN JCODE D ON A.pcode = D.jkey, TB_FPLAN_W020 E WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_FPLAN_WBAD C ON E.lotno = c.plan_no AND C.wflag = '00020' WHERE A.plan_no = E.plan_no and E.indate between #{frdate} and #{todate} and isnull(C.wcode,'') Like concat('%',#{wcode},'%') and isnull(A.lotno,'') Like concat('%',#{lotno},'%') and len(C.wcode) > 0 group by C.wcode, YEAR(E.wfrdt), MONTH(E.wfrdt) order by C.wcode

SELECT sum(isnull(A.prod_qty, 0)) as prod_qty , sum(isnull(E.winqt, 0)) as winqt, sum(isnull(E.wbdqt, 0)) as wbdqt, sum(isnull(E.wotqt, 0)) as wotqt, sum(isnull(E.wotqt, 0)) - sum(isnull(E.wbdqt, 0)) as wjqty, sum(isnull(E.wqcqt, 0)) AS gumqty, Round( (sum(isnull(E.wbdqt, 0)) / sum(isnull(E.wotqt, 0))) * 100 , 2) AS wbdyul, (SELECT com_rem1 from TB_CA510 WHERE com_cls = '005' AND com_code != '00' AND com_REM2 = '00020' AND com_code = C.wcode) AS wbdnm FROM TB_FPLAN A WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT OUTER JOIN JCODE D ON A.pcode = D.jkey, TB_FPLAN_W020 E WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_FPLAN_WBAD C ON E.lotno = c.plan_no AND C.wflag = '00020' WHERE A.plan_no = E.plan_no and E.indate between #{frdate} and #{todate} and isnull(C.wcode,'') Like concat('%',#{wcode},'%') and isnull(A.lotno,'') Like concat('%',#{lotno},'%') and len(C.wcode) > 0 group by C.wcode order by C.wcode

SELECT A.DELDATE, A.DELNUM , B.delseq, A.cltnm as ecltnm, B.pname as jpum, B.psize as jgugek, B.qty as wotqt, B.seqty as gumqty, B.glotno as glotno, B.glasslotno as glotnono, B.gpernm as wrpsnm FROM TB_DA036 A WITH (NOLOCK), TB_DA037 B WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE A.deldate = B.deldate AND A.delnum = B.delnum and A.DELDATE between #{frdate} and #{todate} and isnull(B.glotno,'') Like concat('%',#{lotno},'%') order by A.DELDATE, A.DELNUM , B.delseq

SELECT A.plan_no, A.indate, A.prod_sdate, A.prod_edate, ISNULL(DBO.DF_NM_RTN('TB_WFLAG', A.custcd, A.wflag, '', ''),'') as wflagnm, (CASE WHEN A.wflag = '00010' THEN A.decision1 WHEN A.wflag = '00020' THEN A.decision2 WHEN A.wflag = '00030' THEN A.decision3 WHEN A.wflag = '00040' THEN A.decision4 ELSE A.decision END ) AS STATUSCD, isnull((select wrmcnm from TB_FPLAN_WRMC where wflag = A.wflag and wrmc = C.wrmc),'') as wrmcnm , (case when A.rwflag = 'D' THEN '주간' WHEN A.rwflag = 'N' THEN '야간' ELSE '' END) AS rwflagnm, A.lotno , F.lotno as qclotno, D.jpum, D.jgugek , D.jchajong, (CASE WHEN A.wflag = '00010' THEN A.prod_qty WHEN A.wflag='00020' THEN E.wotqt - E.wbdqt ELSE 0 END) as prod_qty , (CASE WHEN A.wflag = '00010' THEN E.wotqt WHEN A.wflag='00020' THEN F.wotqt ELSE 0 END) as wotqt, (CASE WHEN A.wflag = '00010' THEN E.wbdqt WHEN A.wflag='00020' THEN F.wbdqt ELSE 0 END) as wbdqt, (CASE WHEN A.wflag = '00010' THEN E.wotqt - E.wbdqt WHEN A.wflag='00020' THEN F.wotqt - F.wbdqt ELSE 0 END) as wjqty FROM TB_FPLAN A WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_FPLAN_work C ON A.plan_no = c.plan_no AND A.wflag = c.wflag LEFT OUTER JOIN JCODE D ON A.pcode = D.jkey LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_FPLAN_W010 E ON E.plan_no = A.plan_no LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_FPLAN_W020 F ON F.plan_no = A.plan_no WHERE A.indate between #{frdate} and #{todate} and isnull(A.lotno,'') Like concat('%',#{lotno},'%')
